about.award_desc: Recognized for leadership in energy data applications.
about.title:
National Strategic Vision,
Localized Professional Service
about.p1: Shi-He Intelligent positions itself as a leader in net-zero transformation. Our core team possesses 17 years of system and project management experience from CSIST. We are not just contractors, but strategic partners for enterprises.
about.p2: Our vision is to become the leader in green energy data applications in Asia, transforming complex energy management into simple, efficient, and AI-predictive smart systems, creating long-term sustainable value for client assets.
list: NSTC Net-Zero Member; ESCO Association Member: National-level strategy participation, mastering frontier tech
One-Stop Service: Complete EPC service from planning, application, construction to O&M
Cross-Domain Integration: Strong IT software R&D and system integration capabilities
tech_list: Data-Driven: Exclusive EMS system achieves second-level monitoring and automated dispatch.
Flexible Architecture: Microservices architecture adapts quickly to new equipment and regulations.
High Safety Standards: Energy storage safety exceeds industry standards with BMS/EMS, physical monitoring, early warning, smart fire suppression, and exclusive panel design.

services.title: Comprehensive Energy & Smart Solutions
services.description: We provide a complete ecosystem from green energy construction and MEP energy saving to smart cross-domain applications. Whether it's enterprise net-zero transformation, factory energy saving, or smart agriculture and campus digitization, Shi-He Intelligent is your most trusted partner.

seo.title: Core Services
seo.description: Shi-He Intelligent offers six core services: Green Energy, MEP Engineering, EMS, Consulting, Smart Agriculture, and Smart Education.

services_page.title: Core Services & Solutions
services_page.subtitle: Shi-He Intelligent is dedicated to providing comprehensive energy and smart solutions, from green energy construction and energy-saving engineering to cross-domain AI applications, helping clients achieve sustainable development goals.

green-energy.title: Green Energy Construction
green-energy.description: One-stop solution for solar, BESS, microgrids, and wind-solar hybrid generation, from development to O&M.

mep-engineering.title: MEP & Energy Saving
mep-engineering.description: HVAC saving, ice storage, waste heat recovery, and whole-plant MEP planning, optimizing high-energy-consuming equipment.

ems.title: EMS Energy Management
ems.description: Full-field visual monitoring, AI demand prediction, and automated reporting, making energy data the core of business decisions.

consulting.title: Consulting & Subsidy
consulting.description: Carbon inventory (ISO 14064), carbon footprint (ISO 14067), and government subsidy application assistance for painless transition.

smart-agriculture.title: Smart Agriculture/Care
smart-agriculture.description: AIoT applications including smart greenhouse control, long-term care monitoring, and electronic fencing to solve labor shortages.

smart-education.title: Smart Education & Campus
smart-education.description: Smart blackboards, interactive teaching systems, and campus digitalization solutions for modern efficient learning environments.

seo.title: Smart Care Management System 2025
seo.description: Combining AIoT monitoring, electronic fencing, and mmWave radar. A zero-annual-fee, high-privacy smart care solution for long-term care facilities.
seo.keywords: Smart Care, Long-term Care, Physiological Monitoring, Electronic Fencing, Fall Detection, AIoT Care

hero.description: Combining AIoT physiologic monitoring, electronic fencing, and mmWave radar technology. A Zero Annual Fee, High Privacy smart solution built for long-term care facilities.

features.title: Technology with Warmth
features.subtitle: We selected the three most popular application packages from our catalog to help facilities reduce the burden of rounds and improve resident safety.

health.title: 24H Health Monitoring
health.desc: Real-time monitoring of heart rate, blood oxygen, and body temperature via lightweight smart bands. Alerts sent to nursing stations upon abnormalities.

fence.title: Anti-Wandering Fence
fence.desc: Bluetooth sensors at exits. When a resident with a band approaches restricted areas, the system triggers audio-visual alerts and push notifications.

radar.title: Privacy Fall Detection
radar.desc: Using advanced mmWave radar, precisely detects falls or abnormal inactivity in bathrooms without cameras, fully protecting privacy.

catalog.title: Meeting All Accreditation Needs
catalog.description: Our 2025 catalog includes 13 complete care packages, from basic emergency calls to advanced AI video analysis, which can be combined flexibly.

footer_cta.title: Seize the Last Subsidy Opportunity (2026-2027)
footer_cta.description: As long as data is complete and executed properly, government grants are disbursed upon acceptance. Our system has no annual fee, making it your best partner for upgrading.

seo.title: Corporate Consulting & Subsidy Application
seo.description: Professional carbon inventory consulting and government subsidy application assistance. Helping companies with ISO 14064 certification and SBIR/SIIR R&D grants.
seo.keywords: Carbon Inventory, ISO 14064, Carbon Footprint, Subsidy Application, SBIR, SIIR, ESG Consulting

consulting.title: Corporate Consulting & Subsidy Application
consulting.description: Net-zero transition is not a cost, but a competitive advantage. We help companies assess status, plan pathways, and introduce government subsidies and green finance to reduce transition pain points. Our services cover the full process: 'Carbon Data Inventory - Reduction Strategy - Government Subsidy Implementation - AI Monitoring for Energy Saving - Value Conversion for Corporate Image'.

iso14064.title: ISO 14064-1 GHG Inventory
iso14064.desc: Assist in defining inventory boundaries, identifying emission sources, collecting data, and writing reports.

iso14067.title: ISO 14067 Product Carbon Footprint
iso14067.desc: Lifecycle carbon footprint calculation for export-oriented products to meet CBAM regulations.

subsidy.title: Success & Green Finance
subsidy.description: The government allocates budgets annually to subsidize equipment replacement and energy-saving systems. Our professional team assists in writing proposals, significantly increasing approval rates.
subsidy.finance_note: We also cooperate with multiple public banks to assist clients in applying for 'Green Finance', enjoying lower interest rates and higher loan-to-value ratios.

seo.title: EMS Energy Management System
seo.description: Implement AI Smart Energy Management System (EMS) to monitor power data in real-time, predict demand, and optimize energy usage, helping companies reduce contract capacity overrun risks.
seo.keywords: EMS, Energy Management System, Demand Response, Power Monitoring, Energy Saving Management, AI Energy

ems.title: EMS Energy Management System
ems.description: Invisible energy waste is the most terrifying. Shi-He Intelligent EMS visualizes energy data and uses AI algorithms for precise prediction, achieving automated optimal dispatch.

visual.title: Full-Field Visual Monitoring
visual.desc: Integrates solar, storage, and load into a single dashboard. Supports real-time mobile push notifications for instant anomaly awareness.

prediction.title: AI Demand Prediction & Shedding
prediction.desc: System automatically learns usage patterns to predict overrun risks. Automatically dispatches storage discharge or sheds non-critical loads before overrun occurs to avoid high penalties.

report.title: Automated Report Generation
report.desc: One-click export of daily/monthly/annual energy reports. Can generate energy consumption analysis reports in ISO 50001 format, significantly reducing management workload.

seo.title: Green Energy & Storage Construction
seo.description: One-stop solar PV and storage system construction services, including site assessment, engineering design, construction, and O&M, assisting companies in green energy transition.
seo.keywords: Solar Installation, Storage System, Green Energy, PV Engineering, Microgrid, Fishery-Solar Hybrid

green_energy.title: Green Energy & Storage Construction
green_energy.description: From site development, planning & design, construction to O&M, providing a comprehensive one-stop solution to ensure long-term stable profitability of your green assets.

solar.title: Solar Power System
solar.desc: For rooftop, ground-mounted, and fishery-solar sites. Using Tier 1 high-efficiency modules and smart inverters like SolarEdge/Enphase with arc detection and rapid shutdown for highest safety.

storage.title: Energy Storage System (BESS)
storage.desc: Providing dReg/E-dReg frequency regulation ancillary services and C&I user-side storage (behind-the-meter) to help peak shaving and reduce contract capacity and electricity costs.

om.title: Smart O&M
om.desc: Combining drone infrared thermal inspection with 24/7 remote monitoring center to actively detect module anomalies and ensure generation efficiency.

hybrid.title: Wind-Solar Hybrid & Microgrid
hybrid.description: For islands or remote areas, we provide 'Wind-Solar Hybrid' solutions combining small wind turbines and solar power. Utilizing distributed microgrid technology to integrate various renewable energies and storage, achieving energy self-sufficiency and significantly reducing reliance on diesel generators.
list: All-weather generation: Solar by day, wind by night
Energy Independence: Suitable for off-grid or unstable grid areas

micro.title: Micro Home/Small C&I Storage
micro.description: Residential and small C&I are our most important future service targets. We define bringing green energy into every home, especially remote mountains and disadvantaged groups, improving quality of life through technology as energy equity.

charity.title: Charity & Remote Support
charity.desc: For intergenerational families in mountains, we provide project subsidies and corporate sponsorship to improve living environments for grandparents and children, significantly reducing electricity burdens.

roi.title: 5-Year ROI & UPS
roi.desc: General users can expect a return on investment within 5 years with government subsidies. The system provides continuous cost-saving benefits and ensures stable power supply during grid instability.

safety.title: Best Fire Protection
safety.desc: Filling gaps in industry safety standards. Whether micro or SME storage, all equipped with remote monitoring and exclusive physical detectors, fully compliant with fire regulations to ensure user safety.

micro.toggle: View Micro-Storage Details (Core Tech & Safety Standards)

details.intro: Under global energy transition and net-zero trends, energy storage will become critical core infrastructure. We continue to invest in high-safety cell technology, modular flexible architecture, and AI predictive O&M to plan ahead for clients' energy transition needs for the next 10 years.
standards_list: UL 1973 / UL 9540A: Storage system & thermal runaway/fire safety testing certification.
IEC 62619 / CNS 62619: Battery module safety standards (Europe/Taiwan).
CE / CE-EMC: EU product compliance and electromagnetic compatibility.
UN38.3: Global battery transport testing for compliant export.
details.cert_note: Verified by multi-country high-spec standards, products can be stably applied in industrial, building, microgrid, and medical fields worldwide.
highlights_list: High Safety Design: Low voltage modules, independent thermal cut-off, hot-swappable, enhancing safety and stability.
Smart O&M: Module-level monitoring, cloud data analysis, SOH prediction, creating preventative maintenance mechanisms.
Global Regulation Layout: Mastering IEC/UL/CE trends to meet export market certification needs.

footer_cta.title: Ready to Start Your Green Energy Project?
footer_cta.description: We provide free site assessment and financial model calculation to let you clearly understand the ROI.

seo.title: MEP & Energy Saving Engineering
seo.description: Professional MEP engineering integration and energy saving improvement services, covering power systems, HVAC saving, lighting improvement, and smart monitoring.
seo.keywords: MEP Engineering, Energy Saving, HVAC Saving, Power System, Waste Heat Recovery, Chiller

mep_engineering.title: MEP & Energy Saving Engineering
mep_engineering.description: Systematic optimization for high-energy-consuming equipment. Not only saving electricity costs but also extending equipment life, the first step for companies to implement ESG.

hvac.title: HVAC Energy Saving Retrofit
list: Cooling tower and pump VFD control

ice.title: Ice Storage System Engineering
list: Ice making during off-peak low rates
Melting ice for cooling during peak hours

heat.title: Waste Heat & Air Pressure Recovery
list: Compressor waste heat recovery for hot water

seo.title: Smart Agriculture/Smart Care
seo.description: Smart agriculture solutions combining IoT and AI, including environmental monitoring, automated irrigation, and control systems. Extended to long-term care for safety monitoring.
seo.keywords: Smart Agriculture, Smart Greenhouse, Environmental Monitoring, Automated Irrigation, Smart Care, IoT Agriculture

smart_agriculture.title: Smart Agriculture/Smart Care
smart_agriculture.description: Extending core AIoT technologies to agriculture and care sectors, using technology to solve labor shortages and improve production efficiency and care quality. We understand farmers' hard work and fully assist in utilizing government subsidies to provide better planting environments.

intro_box.title: Friendly Operation: Gov Grants & Zero Annual Fee
intro_box.text: We think for owners. Our smart systems have NO Annual Fees. Additionally, existing long-term care smart subsidies will enter the final phase in 2026-2027. As long as executed properly with complete data, government grants are disbursed upon acceptance. We will fully assist you in securing this resource.

monitor.title: Microclimate Precision Monitoring
monitor.desc: Real-time monitoring of temp, humidity, light, soil EC/pH. Data uploaded to cloud war room.

ai.title: AI Smart Management System
ai.desc: AI crop growth prediction, harvest warning, security management (optical storage surveillance).

light.title: Smart Lighting & Wavelength Optimization
light.desc: Professional advice on light wavelengths for different crops. Combined with smart lighting, can advance harvest by 7-10 days.

contactless.title: Contactless Physiological Monitoring
contactless.desc: Using mmWave radar to detect senior's breathing and heart rate without wearables. High comfort.

fall.title: Fall Detection & Bed Exit Alert
fall.desc: AI image recognition or radar detecting abnormal postures, instantly notifying nursing stations to grasp golden rescue time.

fence.title: Electronic Fence & Zone Alert
fence.desc: Seniors wear watches; if exceeding safe zones, system triggers alarms and notifications for staff.

seo.title: Smart Education & Campus Digitalization
seo.description: Building modern smart campuses, providing smart blackboards, interactive teaching systems, and campus energy management solutions.
seo.keywords: Smart Education, Smart Blackboard, Interactive Teaching, Smart Campus, Digital Learning, Campus Energy Saving

smart_education.title: Smart Education & Campus Digitalization
smart_education.description: Deeply cultivating smart education for over 7 years, focusing on smart classroom solutions, smart blackboards, and one-stop installation. With rich experience and technical accumulation, no field is too difficult for us.

tech.title: Tech-Empowered Education
tech.desc: For 7 years, our mission has been 'Tech-Empowered Education'. With deep understanding of education scenes, mature tech teams, and strict quality control, we have built 3000 smart classrooms for schools across Taiwan (kindergartens to universities), serving huge numbers of teachers and students.

custom.title: Customized Full Lifecycle Service
custom.desc: We persist in 'tailor-made' planning. Based on different needs, site conditions, and budgets, we provide full lifecycle services from survey, design, selection, integration, to installation, training, and maintenance.

product.title: Core Product: Smart Blackboard
product.desc: Integrating HD display, touch interaction, multimedia teaching, and wireless casting. Compatible with traditional writing and modern digital teaching. Seamlessly connects with campus management platforms, breaking traditional limits and improving efficiency.

slides.title: Standard Smart Classroom
slides.desc: Dual sliding blackboard, compatible with traditional writing and modern touch teaching.

slides.title: Digital Teaching Core
slides.desc: Embedded smart screen, eye-care 4K display integrated with multimedia teaching.

slides.title: Large Teaching Space
slides.desc: Dual screen sync display ensuring clarity over long distances, improving interaction in large classrooms.

slides.title: Corporate Info Push
slides.desc: Office or meeting room wall-mount application, serving as real-time bulletin and message center.

slides.title: Outdoor/Assembly Use
slides.desc: Mobile stand with external 20W surround sound, meeting non-fixed venue needs.

slides.title: Professional Training
slides.desc: Interactive teaching demo, showcasing IR light wave 40-point high-precision touch technology.

slides.title: Installation & Debugging
slides.desc: Ensuring stability, organizing power and signal lines according to environment, meeting school needs.

slides.title: Ultra-Large Size App
slides.desc: Supporting 75"/86" series, featuring Android 14.0 system and multiple teaching software.

slides.title: Rapid Mobile Deployment
slides.desc: Suitable for high-mobility classrooms or cram schools, quick boot to use electronic whiteboard functions.

slides.title: Intuitive Operation
slides.desc: Simple friendly interface, supporting long-press commands and two-finger floating ball for easy teacher adoption.

footer.title: Witness to 3000 Smart Classrooms
footer.desc: This proves our hard power in technology, project management, and service quality. We have accumulated mature solutions for various scenes (classrooms, labs, lecture halls), ensuring high-standard delivery.
footer.highlight: In the future, we will continue to deepen smart education, creating high-quality smart teaching spaces for more schools.
